description: Bring your PostgreSQL data into Microsoft Fabric. Mirroring allows you to create a replica of your data in OneLake which can be used for all your analytical needs.

commands.name: az postgres flexible-server fabric-mirroring start
commands.summary: Enable bringing your PostgreSQL data into Microsoft Fabric.
examples: az postgres flexible-server fabric-mirroring start -g testgroup -s testsvr --database-names testdb

commands.name: az postgres flexible-server fabric-mirroring stop
commands.summary: Stop bringing your PostgreSQL data into Microsoft Fabric.
examples: az postgres flexible-server fabric-mirroring stop -g testgroup -s testsvr

commands.name: az postgres flexible-server fabric-mirroring update-databases
examples: az postgres flexible-server fabric-mirroring update-databases -g testgroup -s testsvr --database-names testdb2 testdb3
